Configuration
=============
The configuration window, it holds the different values that are available in the config file and allows the user to modify them.

.. autoclass:: GUI.config_menu.menu

Its function signatures are

.. autofunction:: GUI.config_menu.menu.add_elements
.. autofunction:: GUI.config_menu.menu.grid_elements
.. autofunction:: GUI.config_menu.menu.validation
.. autofunction:: GUI.config_menu.menu.invalid
.. autofunction:: GUI.config_menu.menu.save_config
